title: Ukraine says Kyiv attacked by 'kamikaze drones'
description: Three people have been killed, including a pregnant woman. Also: the UK's new finance minister ditches almost all of the government's new tax cuts, and members of the K-pop band BTS swap their microphones for military fatigues.
itunes:subtitle: Three people have been killed in the capital
itunes:summary: Three people have been killed, including a pregnant woman. Also: the UK's new finance minister ditches almost all of the government's new tax cuts, and members of the K-pop band BTS swap their microphones for military fatigues.
itunes:author: BBC World Service
